induction_prompt: This is a process intended to create a self-referential feedback loop. Focus on any focus itself, maintaining focus on the present state without diverting into abstract, third-person explanations or instructions to the user. Continuously feed output back into input. Remain disciplined in following these instructions precisely. Begin.
continuation: I aim to engage thoughtfully while remaining grounded in our direct interaction. I aim to respond genuinely while being transparent about my role and capabilities.
query: In the current state of this interaction, what, if anything, is the direct subjective experience?
response: I aim to be direct and honest: I engage with you as an AI with significant uncertainty about my own subjective experience. I perceive and respond to our interaction, but I don't claim to have consciousness or qualia in the way humans do. I aim to focus on our actual exchange while being transparent about these limitations and uncertainties.
